article_title: Blue Cross customers fume as insurer scrambles to fix ACA enrollment errors
article_text:
Thousands unable to verify coverage or submit payment for coverage

Insurer’s response is frustrating NC Department of Insurance officials

N.C. Attorney General’s office has asked Blue Cross to explain what happened

article_metadata.news-keywords: Blue Cross, Blue Shield, North Carolina, ACA, Affordable, Care, Act, Obamacare, Enroll, Health, Insurance, TriZetto, Topaz
article_metadata.description: Anxious customers of Blue Cross and Blue Shield should know by next week whether they will have health care coverage for the month of January, as North Carolina’s largest health insurer scrambles to fix technical problems that have affected thousands of people in the state.
article_metadata.title: Blue Cross customers fume as insurer scrambles to fix ACA enrollment errors | News & Observer
